issue.title: [CF 1332] [AltP] no longer updating in combat.
issue.body:
When i use AltP to track my HolyPower in a conditional icon i can use:

[AltP("player", 9)]

But since today this doesn't update in combat anymore. (The HolyPower Dogtag still works in combat). After i leave combat, it will show the correct amount again

I would expect it to work like in prior versions, updating dynamically in combat.

This occurs with version 8.2.1 from Curse.


> Posted by CurseForge user Sinnoh1996 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1332 | Raw

comments.body:
Why are you not using the [HolyPower] tag to track your holy power?


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

@Cybeloras: Go

I changed it to use the [HolyPower] tag and it works now. I think when i started using TMW, there was no [HolyPower] tag (or i didn't find it :)).


> Posted by CurseForge user Sinnoh1996
